item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 12 Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 12 Season 10

Coming at you on this edition of Panther Sports Talk...we recap the football teams win over number 6 SDSU and preview the big home football game against South Dakota, feature a volleyball player inducted into the UNI Hall of fame, check in with the track and field program, see how a former student athlete is paying it forward, spotlight a couple of upperclassmen football players, and a whole lot more UNI Athletics.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 30, Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 30, Season 10

The regular season is in the books for the wrestling and basketball teams....on this edition of Panther Sports Talk we break down the All-Conference awards handed out in St. Louis, we sit down with the head coach of the league leading women's basketball team, feature a true freshman doing big things for the wrestling program and a student athlete who gives back to her community.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 29, Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 29, Season 10

A press conference was held this week for UNI's new Director of Athletics, today we give you a introductory glimpse of UNI AD David Harris. We break down the two MVC games with Coach Jacobson as there's just one remaining regular season game.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 28 Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 28 Season 10

In this Panther Sports Talk, a recap of the win of #25 Wichita State with head coach Ben Jacobson. We also look at two siblings both suiting up for a UNI basketball team. We spotlight Hannah Schonhardt on her return from injury.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 26 Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 26 Season 10

Coming at you on this week's edition of Panther Sports Talk. It's Super Bowl weekend and National Signing Day for College football....we get coach Farley's thoughts on the future of Panther football, We sit down with coach Jacobson for a recap of a couple home Valley games, spotlight a UNI wrestler, and a women's basketball player.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 27 Feb. 12
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 27 Feb. 12

The UNI men have now won 5 games in a row, today we talk with Coach Jacobson about the red-hot Panthers. We also look at the past 10 years of UNI's McLeod Center, tell you about a new agreement that will give you more UNI football games to watch, look at a returning NCAA qualifier, and preview the softball team as they fire up the season this weekend.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 25, Jan. 29
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 25, Jan. 29

With just one month remaining in to the regular season, we hear from assistant coach Kyle Green on the final 9 games of MVC play. We look at what Bennett Koch brings to the floor, hear how the women's basketball team has played themselves into first place, and find out which records the swimming team took down this season.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 24, Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 24, Season 10

Today on Panther Sports Talk....we sit down with Ben Jacobson for a recap of two MVC home games. We check in with Doug Schwab and the UNI Wrestlers. Put the spotlight on the leading scorer for the women's basketball team. Catch up with the UNI president. And we feature true sophomore Wyatt Lohaus.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 23, Season 10
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 23, Season 10

Today we sit down with Ben Jacobson for a look at MVC competition. We preview the Men's and Women's Indoor Track and Field season. Look at two sisters who are helping the women's basketball program. And we feature the versatile senior student athlete Paul Jesperson.

item.title: Panther Sports Talk - Show 21 open
item.description:
Panther Sports Talk - Show 21 open

Get fired up for a brand new edition of Panther Sports Talk! Today we sit down with Ben Jacobson for a recap of the non-conference season and a look at MVC competition. We feature the go-to player for the women's basketball team. University President Bill Ruud reflects on former AD Troy Dannen.
